channel.title: Stuck in First Elevator Door [Fixed]
channel.description:
Howdy
When I stepped off the elevator in bm_c1a0a (sliughtly before is settled at the ledge) I climbed down the ladder to explore. I then climbed back up and approached the door.
When bm_c1a0b loaded, I was stuck in the door and could not move, and it would not open.
Peace, Phil

item.title: Stuck in First Elevator Door [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
Howdy

When I stepped off the elevator in bm_c1a0a (sliughtly before is settled at the ledge) I climbed down the ladder to explore. I then climbed back up and approached the door.
